problem_text_cn: 如图,在直角坐标系中,点A的坐标是(2,3),则tanα的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the plane rectangular coordinate system, the coordinates of point A are (N_0,N_1), then the value of tanα is ()
raw_answer:
解:如图,过点A作AB⊥x轴于B,∵A(2,3),∴OB=2,AB=3,∴tanα=\frac{AB}{OB}=\frac{3}{2}．
故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了锐角三角形函数的定义,坐标与图形性质,是基础题,熟记概念是解题的关键．
